item.title: Babe Ruth used steriods?</
item.description: Houston Astros second baseman Jeff Kent said the steroids controversy is an embarrassment to baseball and that the public needs to rethink whether sports heroes of yore abstained from illegal performance-enhancing drugs.

item.title: Phoenix sports fans shells out the bucks
item.description: Phoenix-area taxpayers have invested $700 million in new stadiums for their pro baseball, basketball, football, and hockey franchises, a world record for governmental sports support, as described in today's Washington Post.

item.title: Just buy it
item.description: Marion Jones competing in floor gymnastics, Randy Johnson bowling, Lance Armstrong in the boxing ring, Andre Agassi fielding 2B for the Red Sox. Nike rolls out their spring campaign asking in some rather creatively edited commercial spots starting tonight.
